rules_text:
Enchant land
When Arrive, Surrounded by Petals enters the battlefield, audition for green. [i](Create a 1/1 Construct Actor creature token, a Scout Role giving 2/3 and vigilance, or a Warrior Role giving 3/2 and trample. Roles replace older ones.)[/i]
Enchanted land has “{T}: Add one mana of any color.”
